DOC.brief_summary: In healthy young subject single bout strength training follow endurance train show improve marker aerobic capacity muscle compare single bout endurance train alone . The present project test hypothesis : 12 week train session endurance training follow strength training superior endurance train alone health participant 50-65 year age . The outcome measure maximal oxygen uptake knee-extension strength .
DOC.brief_title: Does Aerobic Training Followed Resistance Training Enhance Aerobic Capacity Seniors
DOC.criteria: healthy understand Danish language medical contraindication training take betablockers physical exercise training 2 hr per week
